body.name: Furnulem 4 Drawer Dresser, Vertical Nightstand for Kids, Adult, Fabric Chest of Drawers for Bedroom, Living Room, Closet, Nusery, Storage Tower Unit Retro Style Furniture, Wood Desk Top
deliveryMessages: Or fastest Same-Day delivery Today 5 PM - 10 PM. Order within 7 hrs 42 mins
features: 【Multi-scene Application】The size of Furnulem 4 drawer dresser:15.8" Lx 11.8" W x 31.5" H. The storage tower is designed in a bohemian style. It can be a storage dresser/nightstand in the bedroom or a side table in the living room, also great for closets, nurseries, entryways, hallways, offices, playrooms, children's room and more.

【Durable Fabric Drawer】The size of foldable drawer: 14.2" Lx 11.1" W x 7.1" H. Each fabric drawer offers large storage space, perfect for organizing clothes, toys, socks, underwear, scarves, blankets and other accessories. The drawers are made of fabric, lightweight and durable, and won't pinch hands, also safe for child to use.

【Sturdy And Durable】The vertical dresser made with sturdy metal frame with wooden top board. Wood top provides hard surface for displaying lamps, alarm clocks, books, eyeglasses, etc. The back of the dresser is equiped with more reinforced X-type crossbar, which offers high strength support and ensure years of use.

【Adjustable Feet & Anti Tip Kit】4 adjustable feet for uneven ground and protect the floor from scratches. Anti-toppling device is provided to prevent it from falling down and aimed at providing stability and preventing shaking. This reflects our emphasis on safety, especially for kids.

【Easy Assembly】The chest of drawer is easy to assemble with tools included in the package, you can refer to the Installation instructions. Perfect gift with functional and decorative characters. Our perfect after-sales service will solve all customer problems for you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for storage on any room
reviews.reviewText: I used for dining room to store extra dishes, tea, gadgets, etc. works great, not flimsy at all, so not sure why anyone says that. These are heavy duty felt, and are sturdy, wouldn’t put anything too too heavy but put in several glass tea sets and holds just fine. Great and pretty easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, Sturdy and Just What I Needed
reviews.reviewText: This unit is pretty and better quality than I thought it might be, especially the flower fabric. This shelving unit was easy to build; it took me a little over an hour mostly by myself with a couple of stops in between. I needed some help holding up one of the sides while I screwed the other side in and got one of the back braces on. I read reviews prior that someone didn’t do that and it caused damage. One of the bases to one of the drawers was slightly damaged, but it was facing the bottom of the drawer and didn’t show, so no big deal. It did not affect the unit at all. Note that the unit is not sturdy until you fill the drawers. It comes with hardware to attach to the wall or even another piece of furniture to keep it from tipping over. I do not use it and have no tipping issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Metal frames, and plenty of drawer space
reviews.reviewText: Love how this product has a metal frame and does not feel super flimsy. The designs on the drawers are gorgeous. This is a perfect piece that will match almost any decor. The drawers have quite a bit of room and hold plenty. Assembly took about 20 minutes for each and is very simple to follow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Instructions are USELESS!
reviews.reviewText: This piece looks like the photo. It’s just a metal frame with a wooden top and fabric drawers. The drawers are super easy to put together and the handles for them as well, but the directions are absolutely awful!! It’s basically a diagram with letters. For some reason, there is no instruction video for this particular piece, even though there are videos for almost every other piece in this line.It was a lot of trial and error. The pieces they provided to stick it to the wall are also pretty useless, but it’s a very small dresser-and not heavy-so I wouldn’t even use them.The stars are for the beauty of the drawers, the amount of space (in a small piece of furniture),and it appears pretty sturdy. I wouldn’t necessarily use this as a dresser if you have a lot of large clothing to put in it-for example, if you live in a cold climate and need sweaters. If you live in a warm climate, this probably has enough space.I think it’s about $10 overpriced but I think it’s a clever design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than I thought
reviews.reviewText: This product is exactly as described and better than I thought. I got it on sale and felt the quality would be a gamble. The frame is solid and the drawers are thick quality fabric. The front of the bins/drawers have a very soft smooth finish. Easy to assemble too. I'd recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money.
reviews.reviewText: This piece is very flimsy but looks pretty and is good for light storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this perfect size set of drawers
reviews.reviewText: I needed something small that added some color to the room and could also store some important items. This set of drawers was perfect. It came quickly and was super easy to put together. I'm already looking at a set of larger ones. I love the decorations- such a nice touch on the fabric drawers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were clear. Came well packaged. Easy to assemble and a really love the look! Feels quite sturdy.The only thing I would sometimes really love is if they would make the inside of the cubbies lighter and color so one can actually see what they put in there! It's hard when everything is dark.Would buy it over and over and over again. Gorgeous
